description.value:
You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school.

If you're an abjurer, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Energy Absorption]; if you're a conjurer, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dimensional Steps]; if you're a diviner, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Vigilant Eye]; if you're an enchanter, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dread Aura]; if you're an evoker, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Elemental Tempest]; if you're an illusionist, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Invisibility Cloak]; if you're a necromancer, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Life Siphon]; and if you're a transmuter, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shifting Form].

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
